title: Eternity's Touch
description: I knew I shouldn't have gone out that night.But I didn't know the wolf would return. I didn't know he would hunt me down, claim me and make me his. I didn't know I would spend half a century running from him. And worst of all, I didn't know how strong the bond forged between us would be.But I knew I shouldn't have gone out that night.This is not a love story -- this is a dark & twisted tale of lust, unwavering desire, and a bond that never dies.
author: Ingrid Ash
